title: ASE Machine Learning Engineer - Privacy & Foundation Models
summary: Are you passionate about building extraordinary products and embracing privacy? It's central to all that we do! The goal of the Apple Services Engineering Machine Learning Lifecycle team is to take personalization, search, and more to the next level of intelligence and accuracy using advanced ML and statistical techniques.
description: We work on a wide spectrum of approaches, including foundation modeling, federated learning, deep learning, model compression, transfer learning and more. We work on core machine learning algorithms and models to power personalization in an efficient, scalable, and private manner. This position involves a wide variety of skills and innovation. This is a rare opportunity that sits at the state of the art of machine learning and software!
key_qualifications: Proficient programming skills in Python; Hands-on experience working with deep learning toolkits such as Jax, Tensorflow, or PyTorch; Proven track record in training or deployment of large models or building large-scale distributed systems; Deep understanding of Deep Learning and Large Language Models (LLMs); Natural Language Processing
education_experience: Master’s degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or related field and 4+ years of experience in the job offered or related occupation.
